Author: Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>
Date:   Wed, 26 Dec 2012 23:38:54 -0500

Move source files into src/

Split out Makefiles using roughly the scheme described in "Recursive
Make Considered Harmful" (http://aegis.sourceforge.net/auug97.pdf)

-          debug.o content.o

+DIRS := src src/lib src/3party
+override CPPFLAGS += $(patsubst %,-I%, $(DIRS))
+OBJECTS :=
+include $(patsubst %, %/Makefrag, $(DIRS))
+DEPFILES := $(foreach obj,$(OBJECTS), $(dir $(obj)).$(notdir $(obj:.o=)).d)
 
 all: codesearch $(DEPFILES)
